text:
Fuss free registration, friendly receptionist and doctor. Consulted with Dr Wendy who was patient to hear my symptoms and offer advice.

Clinic is clean and seems like they offer many services including health checks.

Only gripe is that there is not many waiting seats in the clinic so might need to sit outside which can be quite warm.

I can't express enough how grateful I am to have found Dr. Nicole Chan.

From the moment I walked into the consultation room, she took the time to listen to all my concerns and explained everything in detail, making sure I felt comfortable and confident moving forward with treatment. I felt very welcomed, heard and understood. Her expertise and genuine care was very evident and I would highly recommend her to anyone in need of top-notch care!

Thank you so much Dr. Nicole! It is truly rare to find a doctor who prioritizes her patients in the way that you do!

My first time visit this clinic @Our Fernvale Family Clinic for flu vaccine jap.

The front desk staff are friendly.

DR.Wendy Wong who done my jap are super friendly and I have some great conversations with her during my injection.

Thank you DR.Wendy Wong

Very kind and patient doctor who is willing to listen to patients and treat them accurately. Visited twice and always had very good experience. Receptionists are very helpful and polite too. If you stay around fernvale, this is the clinic to go to!

My Dad visited this newly opened clinic and was impressed by the professionalism of the doctor on duty, Dr Wendy Wong. Dr Wong was friendly, attentive and provided useful medical advice. The counter registration process was also fast and hassle-free. The clinic is clean and welcoming with kid-friendly decorations. I will certainly bring my family members to this clinic for medical services including vaccination and health checkups.
